blog.name: Github
blog.shortdescription: Github is actually a development platform based on git which is a distributed version-control system. However, they added a fitur that allows users to build their own webpage. Building here helps to learn best practice of backing up your own contents because the process is that you have build your content locally initially which then uploaded to your Github webpage repository using git. On other free blogs, I once have one deleted because I forgot to extend and since I don't have backup of the data, it's lost forever.

blog.name: Blogger
blog.shortdescription: One of the earliest blogging site hosted by Google.

blog.name: Wordpress
blog.shortdescription: One of the most popular CMS today for your own hosting or try their free hosting.

blog.name: Medium
blog.shortdescription: A platform dedicated for articles and readers. You probably already know because it is very popular that it almost always shows on seach engines.
blog.cost: free but paid membership are also available.

blog.name: Wix
blog.shortdescription: Site building platform where there are many business, marketing, and search engine optimization (SEO) tools. The step by step SEO setup helps you learn how to make any sites discoverable.

blog.name: Weebly
blog.shortdescription: Site building platform where you can put third party codes easily. They provide code sections such as Google analytics, Goodle adsense, Google search, etc. Therefore, it's a good place to learn about those stuffs for beginners.

blog.name: Yola
blog.shortdescription: Very flexible and light to design.
blog.cost: free up to 2 pages and 1GB storage

blog.name: Joomla
blog.shortdescription: Professional CMS but difficult to use.
blog.cost: free but must renew each month or be deleted or upgrade.

video.name: Youtube
video.shortdescription: The number one video platform today.

video.name: Dailymotion
video.shortdescription: The number two video platform today.

video.name: Liveleak
video.shortdescription: Specialized in news and politic videos.

video.name: Bittube.TV
video.shortdescription: At first it was a decentralized and censorship committed version of Youtube. Now it evolves into a social video platform and many more including the Bittube App where it is recommended you register through my link before going to bittube.tv especially if you are a content creator.

video.name: LBRY.TV
video.shortdescription: Became popular amidst the mass Youtube error censorship of cryptocurrency related videos in around new years eve 2019. The events sparks a move among crypto content creators and made them aware that they are not safe in Youtube alike and they need to take back control of their contents. Even LBRY.TV headline is 'It is time to take back control from YouTube'. They successfully implement a feature to backup and synchronize our Youtube videos to their site which is very convenient for me as a content creator.

video.name: Bitchute
video.shortdescription: BitChute is a video hosting service founded in 2017. It was created to allow video uploaders to avoid content rules enforced on other platforms, such as YouTube. The platform accommodates far-right individuals and conspiracy theorists; with the Southern Poverty Law Center saying the site hosts 'hate-fueled material'. Some creators who have been banned or had their channels barred from receiving advertising revenue ('demonetized') on YouTube have migrated to BitChute.

video.name: DTube
video.shortdescription: Another video platform that dedicates to censorship resistance that is build on top the steem blockchain. However I have problems where my videos are unaccessible probably the IPFS nodes are down and not backup on their platform. Therefore, make sure your video is popular so many nodes backup your videos or keep your uploader open, or power up with steem coin or upcoming dtube token.

video.name: DLive
video.shortdescription: Another video platform built on top of blockchain and dedicates ownership to creators and users whether in term of contents or rewards.

video.name: PeerTube
video.shortdescription: Host your own video platform with peer to peer technology.

video.name: Livepeer
video.shortdescription: Host your own video platform with peer to peer technology.

video.name: Viewly
video.shortdescription: Another video platform built on top of blockchain and dedicates ownership to creators and users whether in term of contents or rewards.
